import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Header from'./components/Header';import Home from'./components/Home';import Productos from'./components/Productos';import Contacto from'./components/Contacto';import Llaveros from'./components/Llaveros';import Cuadros from'./components/Cuadros';import Carrito from'./components/Carrito';import AuthGoogle from'./components/AuthGoogle';import UserProfile from'./components/UserProfile';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[currentView,setCurrentView]=useState('home');const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[showCart,setShowCart]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=localStorage.getItem('craftmaster_user');if(storedUser){setUser(JSON.parse(storedUser));}setLoading(false);},[]);const handleLogin=userData=>{setUser(userData);localStorage.setItem('craftmaster_user',JSON.stringify(userData));setCurrentView('profile');};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('craftmaster_user');setUser(null);setCurrentView('auth');};const handleNavigation=view=>{setCurrentView(view);};const handleCategoryClick=category=>{switch(category){case'llaveros':setCurrentView('llaveros');break;case'cuadros':setCurrentView('cuadros');break;case'cajoneras':setCurrentView('llaveros');// ¿Quizás esto debería ser 'cajoneras'?
break;default:setCurrentView('home');break;}};const addToCart=product=>{const existingProduct=cart.findIndex(item=>item.name===product.name);if(existingProduct>-1){const updatedCart=[...cart];updatedCart[existingProduct].quantity+=1;setCart(updatedCart);}else{setCart([...cart,{...product,quantity:1}]);}setShowCart(true);};const removeFromCart=index=>{const updatedCart=cart.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setCart(updatedCart);};const toggleCart=()=>{setShowCart(!showCart);};const renderView=()=>{const commonProps={addToCart};switch(currentView){case'auth':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthGoogle,{onLogin:handleLogin});case'profile':return user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProfile,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthGoogle,{onLogin:handleLogin});case'home':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{onCategoryClick:handleCategoryClick});case'productos':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Productos,{...commonProps});case'contacto':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contacto,{});case'llaveros':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Llaveros,{...commonProps});case'cuadros':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cuadros,{...commonProps});case'cajoneras':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{onCategoryClick:handleCategoryClick});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{onCategoryClick:handleCategoryClick});}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-8",children:"Cargando aplicaci\xF3n..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{user:user,onNavigation:handleNavigation,onLogout:handleLogout,toggleCart:toggleCart,cartItemCount:cart.length}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:renderView()}),showCart&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carrito,{cart:cart,removeFromCart:removeFromCart,onClose:toggleCart})]});};export default App;
